thread.title: Louis Farrakhan gives speech in Detroit to chants of ‘Allah u Akbar’
thread.title_full: Louis Farrakhan gives speech in Detroit to chants of ‘Allah u Akbar’

author: William A.
title: Louis Farrakhan gives speech in Detroit to chants of ‘Allah u Akbar’
text:
Louis Farrakhan gives speech in Detroit to chants of ‘Allah u Akbar’ Posted at 8:23 pm on February 19, 2017 by William A. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
So, this happened Sunday night in Detroit: Tomorrow, I'll be delivering the Saviours' Day keynote address at the Joe Louis Arena. Watch Live https://t.co/83MMBEnexU #SD17DET pic.twitter.com/S9l8dya35b 
— MINISTER FARRAKHAN (@LouisFarrakhan) February 18, 2017 
And here are some words of wisdom from before the event started: America: You’re headed into the abyss of hell. 
— MINISTER FARRAKHAN (@LouisFarrakhan) February 16, 2017 The deceitful hypocrites who use good words to draw ignorant people into their web need to have their system exposed. 
— MINISTER FARRAKHAN (@LouisFarrakhan) February 15, 2017 When Allah promises, He fulfills His Promise. When the enemy promises, he promises only to deceive. 
— MINISTER FARRAKHAN (@LouisFarrakhan) February 13, 2017 
And the event itself. Video and tweets: Min. Farrakhan enters Joe Louis Arena in Detroit as crowd cheers and says "Allah u Akbar" and "Long live Muhammad." #SD17DET pic.twitter.com/4m9SBatp5K 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 The Honorable Minister Louis Farrakhan takes the stage at Joe Louis Arena for Saviours' Day 2017. @WWJ950 pic.twitter.com/BKZa2Z8tYq 
— Lauren Barthold (@bylaurenb) February 19, 2017 Here HE is!!! Live at the Joe Louis Arena!!! https://t.co/RnhWQYMdkD #SD17DET #Farrakhan pic.twitter.com/Gi54QcX4TK 
— Brother Jesse (@BrotherJesse) February 20, 2017 People arriving to hear Min. Louis Farrakhan speak in Detroit on the final day of the Nation of Islam convention in Detroit. #SD17DET pic.twitter.com/tEFZpoZwNt 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Farrakhan says @keithellison , ex-Nation member, "has to bow" to "members of Jewish community" by condemning Farrakhan to lead DNC. #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Speaking in Detroit at the Nation of Islam convention, Farrakhan says that Jewish people are not "the chosen of God." #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Loud applause from the audience at Nation of Islam convention in Detroit when Farrakhan criticizes the Democrats: https://t.co/G5jhJO5PcQ 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Min. Farrakhan praises Trump's "what do you have to lose" line he used in the campaign, saying Democrats haven't helped blacks. #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 At Nation of Islam convention, Farrakhan says: If you think Democrats are going to help blacks, "you're out of your mind." #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Farrakhan to LGBT: "I'm not speaking against you…you're my brother…my sister, & I really love you," but "correct…behavior" #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Minister Farrakhan on Hillary Clinton: "She's more of a hawk than President Trump." She "pushed Obama to kill Muammar Gaddafi." #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Farrakhan: "America will never be made great again. Her days of greatness are over. The God of justice has come." #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Farrakhan: Integration hasn't worked because whites "don't want to be with you. Can't you get the message? They don't want you." #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Farrakhan says to Obama: "Let's have coffee"& talk about the problems in Chicago with violence, don't let Trump bring in troops. #SD17DET 
— Niraj Warikoo (@nwarikoo) February 19, 2017 Trending
